nodes.bodyText: Since we are changing this to an absolute path we need to ignore this system property for the purposes of task input snapshotting or it'll break cache reuse. We'll need to move this down below where we set other properties with absolute paths via nonInputProperties.

+                // we use 'temp' relative to CWD since this is per JVM and tests are forbidden from writing to CWD
